action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'firefox=`pidof firefox`; if [ -n "$firefox" ]; then xdotool search "Mozilla Firefox" windowactivate --sync key --clearmodifiers ctrl+l; else nohup firefox > /dev/null; sleep 4; exec xdotool key alt+3; fi'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'firefox=`pidof firefox`; if [ -n "$firefox" ]; then xdotool search "Mozilla Firefox" windowactivate --sync key --clearmodifiers ctrl+l; else mkdir -p ~/.firefox-rofe/ ; firefox --profile ~/.firefox-rofe/'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'firefox=`pidof firefox`; if [ -n "$firefox" ]; then xdotool search "Mozilla Firefox" windowactivate --sync key --clearmodifiers ctrl+l; else firefox --profile ~/.firefox-mobile/'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'firefox=`pidof firefox`; if [ -n "$firefox" ]; then xdotool search "Mozilla Firefox" windowactivate --sync key --clearmodifiers ctrl+l; else nohup firefox > /dev/null; sleep 4; exec xdotool key alt+3; fi'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'xrefresh; zenity --ellipsize --info --text "$(wmctrl -l)"; export entry=`zenity --entry --text="Enter window id." --entry-text="Enter window id."`; wmctrl -ia "$entry"'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'check_transmission="/tmp/check-transmission-gtk.txt"; transmission=`wmctrl -l | grep Transmission | head -n 1 | awk "{print $1 }"`; if pidof transmission-gtk; then wmctrl -ic "$transmission"; else transmission-gtk; fi; if [ ! -e "$check_transmission" ]; then touch "$check_transmission"; transmission-gtk; sleep 0.50; xdotool windowsize "$(xdotool getactivewindow)" 100% 100%; else rm "$check_transmission"; wmctrl -ic "$transmission"; fi'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'xrefresh; pulseaudio -k; wmctrl -l; pulseaudio --start; zenity --title "Correcting errors" --error --ellipsize --text "Correcting errors:\n\nSound, video, WM..."'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'kitty -e ffmpeg -video_size 1920x1080 -framerate 15 -f x11grab -re -i "$DISPLAY" -f pulse -ac 2 -i default -ar 22050 -c:a libmp3lame -c:v libx264 -bsf:v h264_mp4toannexb -max_muxing_queue_size 9999 -f mp4 -movflags frag_keyframe+empty_moov "/home/$USER/Vídeos/Tela_$(date +"%d-%m-%Y_%H:%M:%S").mp4"'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'kitty -e ffmpeg -video_size 1920x1080 -f x11grab -re -i "$DISPLAY" -f pulse -ac 2 -i default -ar 22050 -c:a libmp3lame -c:v libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -maxrate 10000k -bufsize 20000k -pix_fmt yuv420p -framerate 15 -g 52 -max_muxing_queue_size 9999 -f mp4 -bsf:v h264_mp4toannexb -movflags frag_keyframe+empty_moov "/home/$USER/Vídeos/Tela_$(date +"%d-%m-%Y_%H:%M:%S").mp4"'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'xrandr --output eDP-1-1 --primary --mode 1920x1080 --rate 120.00 --pos 0x0 --rotate normal --output HDMI-0 --off; xrandr --output eDP-1 --primary --mode 1920x1080 --rate 120.00 --pos 0x0 --rotate normal --output HDMI-1-0 --off'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'xrandr --output eDP-1-1 --mode 1920x1080 --rate 120.00 --pos 0x0 --rotate normal --output HDMI-0 --mode 1920x1080 --pos 0x0 --rotate inverted; xrandr --output eDP-1 --mode 1920x1080 --rate 120.00 --pos 0x0 --rotate normal --output HDMI-1-0 --mode 1920x1080 --pos 0x0 --rotate inverted; pactl set-card-profile 0 off'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'xrandr --output HDMI-0 --mode 1920x1080 --pos 0x0 --rotate inverted --output eDP-1-1 --off; xrandr --output HDMI-1-0 --mode 1920x1080 --pos 0x0 --rotate inverted --output eDP-1 --off; pactl set-card-profile 0 off'

action.name: Execute
action.command:
bash -c 'pkill -9 tv-default-volu; export script=~/.local/bin/tv-default-volume.sh; export Current_Volume=`~/.local/bin/Current_Volume.sh` export old_vol=`cat "$script" | head -5 | sed -n 5p | cut -c 16-17 | grep -E "[^[:blank:]]"`; export new_vol=`zenity --text "Current volume is $Current_Volume.
Volume is limited on $old_vol.

Enter new volume:" --entry`; sed -i "5s/$old_vol/$new_vol/" "$script" | sed -i "5s/=$/=$new_vol/" "$script"; "$script"'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'catt play_toggle; check_pause="/tmp/pause_streaming_check.txt"; if [ ! -e "$check_pause" ]; then touch "${check_pause}"; ~/.local/bin/lgtv media.controls pause; else rm "${check_pause}"; ~/.local/bin/lgtv media.controls play; fi'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'catt play_toggle; check_pause="/tmp/pause_streaming_check.txt"; if [ ! -e "$check_pause" ]; then touch "${check_pause}"; ~/.local/bin/lgtv media.controls pause; else rm "${check_pause}"; ~/.local/bin/lgtv media.controls play; fi'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'zenity --icon-name applications-multimedia --info --title="Status da Reprodução" --text="$(catt status)" --width="600" height="600"'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'time=`zenity --entry --text "Defina o tempo que você quer avançar" --title "Tempo do vídeo"` ; catt seek "$time"'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'catt cast $(xclip -selection clipboard -o) #you_url=`zenity --entry --text "Insira o link do Youtube ou outro Streaming que deseja ser exibido" --title "Streaming"` ; catt cast "$you_url"'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'pavuc=`wmctrl -l | grep "Controle de volume" | head -n 1 | awk "{print $1 }"`; if pidof pavucontrol; then wmctrl -ic "$pavuc"; else pavucontrol; fi'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'pavuc=`wmctrl -l | grep "Controle de volume" | head -n 1 | awk "{print $1 }"`; if pidof pavucontrol; then wmctrl -ic "$pavuc"; else pavucontrol; fi'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c "pkill -9 xcompmgr; pkill -9 xcompmgr; picom --experimental-backends --backend glx --xrender-sync-fence"

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c "ponymix toggle #pactl set-sink-mute 0 toggle ; pactl set-sink-mute 4 toggle"

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c "ponymix decrease 2% ; pactl set-sink-volume 0 -3% ; pactl set-sink-volume 4 -3%; pkill -9 osd_cat; xrefresh; echo Volume:\ `pactl list sinks | grep '^[[:space:]]Volume:' | head -n $(( $SINK + 1 )) | tail -n 1 | sed -e 's,.* \([0-9][0-9]*\)%.*,\1,'` | osd_cat -d 1 -s 30 -A center -l 1 -p middle -o 30 --color=#00ff73 --shadow=1 -f '-*-helvetica-bold-*-*-*-64-*-*-*-*-*-*'"

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c "ponymix increase 2% ; pactl set-sink-volume 0 +3% ; pactl set-sink-volume 4 +3%; pkill -9 osd_cat; xrefresh; echo Volume:\ `pactl list sinks | grep '^[[:space:]]Volume:' | head -n $(( $SINK + 1 )) | tail -n 1 | sed -e 's,.* \([0-9][0-9]*\)%.*,\1,'` | osd_cat -d 1 -s 30 -A center -l 1 -p middle -o 30 --color=#00ff73 --shadow=1 -f '-*-helvetica-bold-*-*-*-64-*-*-*-*-*-*'"

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'export max_brightness=`cat /sys/class/backlight/intel_backlight/max_brightness`; export check_brightness="/tmp/brightness_check.txt"; export brightness=`echo "$max_brightness"/3.3 | bc`; if [ ! -e "$check_brightness" ]; then touch "${check_brightness}"; echo 0 | tee /sys/class/backlight/intel_backlight/brightness; else rm "${check_brightness}"; echo "${brightness}" | tee /sys/class/backlight/intel_backlight/brightness; fi'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'export max_brightness=`cat /sys/class/backlight/intel_backlight/max_brightness`; export check_brightness="/tmp/brightness_check.txt"; export brightness=`echo "$max_brightness"/3.3 | bc`; if [ ! -e "$check_brightness" ]; then touch "${check_brightness}"; echo 0 | tee /sys/class/backlight/intel_backlight/brightness; else rm "${check_brightness}"; echo "${brightness}" | tee /sys/class/backlight/intel_backlight/brightness; fi'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'cd ~/ ; mkdir -p "$HOME/Imagens/Captura de Tela/" ; scrot "$HOME/Imagens/Captura de Tela/Captura de tela de %d-%m-%Y %H:%M:%S.png" ; mkdir -p ~/.local/songs/ ; cd ~/.local/songs/ ; wget -nc https://github.com/felipefacundes/dotfiles/blob/master/config/songs/camera_shutter.mp3?raw=true -O camera_shutter.mp3 ; paplay ~/.local/songs/camera_shutter.ogg'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'cd ~/ ; mkdir -p "$HOME/Imagens/Captura de Tela/" ; scrot -d 4 "$HOME/Imagens/Captura de Tela/Captura de tela de %d-%m-%Y %H:%M:%S.png" ; mkdir -p ~/.local/songs/ ; cd ~/.local/songs/ ; wget -nc https://github.com/felipefacundes/dotfiles/blob/master/config/songs/camera_shutter.mp3?raw=true -O camera_shutter.mp3 ; paplay ~/.local/songs/camera_shutter.ogg'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'cd ~/ ; mkdir -p "$HOME/Imagens/Captura de Tela/" ; scrot -s "$HOME/Imagens/Captura de Tela/Captura de tela de %d-%m-%Y %H:%M:%S.png"'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'cd ~/ ; mkdir -p "$HOME/Imagens/Captura de Tela/" ; scrot -u "$HOME/Imagens/Captura de Tela/Captura de tela de %d-%m-%Y %H:%M:%S.png" ; mkdir -p ~/.local/songs/ ; cd ~/.local/songs/ ; wget -nc https://github.com/felipefacundes/dotfiles/blob/master/config/songs/camera_shutter.mp3?raw=true -O camera_shutter.mp3 ; paplay ~/.local/songs/camera_shutter.ogg'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c "kitty -e sudo pacman -Syyu --noconfirm; sudo mkinitcpio -P; sudo grub-mkconfig -o /boot/grub/grub.cfg"
